## 2.1.3
Tue, 16 May 2017 00:01:03 GMT

### Patches

## 2.1.2
Thu, 27 Apr 2017 13:03:03 GMT

### Patches

- Fixing the development certificate to have the subjectAltName property to work with new versions of browsers.

## 2.1.0
